entry.def: An advertiser is a person or company that pays for a product, event, or job to be advertised in a newspaper, on television, or on a poster.

entry.tran: (用于某些地方报纸的名称中)
entry.def: Advertiser is used in the name of some local newspapers.

auth_sentence.content: I definitely prefer one large dollar advertiser to the Google skyscraper.

Sentence.sentence: Facebook then attempts to make money by selling their data to advertisers that want to send targeted messages.

sentences.en: We’ve had several phone calls already this morning from advertisers.
sentences.cn: 我们今天上午已接到好几个广告客户的电话。

sentences.en: The only funny things we heared that evening came from the advertiser at the beginning of the programme.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上唯一有趣的事情是节目开始时那个报幕员的开场白。
